TEXT.TITLE: GEAC COMPUTER <GAC.TO> LEAVES RECEIVERSHIP
TEXT.BODY:
Geac Computer Corp Ltd said the Supreme Court of Ontario has signed an order approving the company's proposal for repayment of its creditors and releasing the company from receivership.
Reuter
